ComicInfo.Summary: Desert Heat: The new Hulk takes Bruce into the desert and transforms into Rick Jones. Bruce and Rick wander around trying to figure out how they have gotten into this terrible situation when both transform into their respective Hulks (Banner is now grey and smart with a bad attitude) and the two battle. SHIELD merges Thunderbolt Ross with Zzzax and the villain escapes to battle the Hulk.
